calculatorTotalPrice() - Method in class controller.MenuController
This method calculates the total price of all the chosen products that are currently in the cart.

This class represents the cart - will show the products that the client chose to buy, and the relevant info about them.

This class overrides some of the methods defined in the abstract superclass in order to give more functionality to the client.

Constructs an instance of the chat client.
ChatIF - Interface in common
This interface implements the abstract method used to display objects onto the client or server UIs.
